arts.ttl: Future Chelsea signing Estevao Willian scores last-gasp free kick to keep Palmeiras in Brasileiro title race
arts.sum: Estevao Willian - who will join Chelsea in July - scores a last-gasp free kick to keep Palmeiras in the Brasileiro title race heading into the final matchday.

arts.ttl: Exclusive: What David Sullivan thinks about replacing Julen Lopetegui with Michael Carrick as West Ham manager
Bayern Munich vs. Heidenheim: How David has often troubled Goliath
arts.sum: Round two of this match-up would be at the Allianz Arena once again, but this time Heidenheim faced Bayern as a fellow Bundesliga side. An early goal from Leon Goretzka would have shook the nerves of any other side, but not Heidenheim, who not only equalised but would go on to take the lead into half-time thanks to goals from Robert Glatzel and club legend Marc Schnatterer .

arts.ttl: Romeo Beckham shows his true colours as he trolls dad David with two-word social media message after Arsenal beat Man United
arts.sum: United lost 2-0 at Arsenal in the Premier League on Wednesday thanks to second-half goals from Jurrien Timber and William Saliba.

arts.ttl: David de Gea shows where his loyalties lie with four-word Man Utd admission
arts.sum: Manchester United and Arsenal met on Wednesday night almost seven years to the day that David de Gea turned in a record-breaking performance in a 3-1 win against the Gunners at the Emirates Stadium

arts.ttl: DAZN secures exclusive Fifa Club World Cup rights
arts.sum: Streaming platform DAZN secures exclusive rights to broadcast next summer's Fifa Club World Cup.
